class.name: DatabaseConnection
class.brief_description: Represents a connection to a database server.
class.description: Represents a connection to a database server. Don't create these directly, use the [code]get_connection()[/code] method in [Database] to get one.

method.name: create_prepared_statement
method.description: Creates a [PreparedStatement] for use with this database connection.

method.name: database_connect
method.description: Connect to the database. The backend will automatically call this.

method.name: ensure_version_table_exists
method.description: Ensures that a table that contains the database's verison exists for compatibility checks.

method.name: escape
method.description: Escapes the given [String] using the database backend's excape method. Use it on user input for sanitization. Note that [QueryBuilder] does this where necessary automatically. Also note that when using [PreparedStatement]s this is not needed.

method.name: get_query_builder
method.description: Returns a new [QueryBuilder] that is properly set up for this connection.

method.name: get_table_builder
method.description: Returns a new [TableBuilder] that is properly set up for this connection.

method.name: get_table_version
method.description: Returns the current table version. This can be used to determine database compatibility, or for example whether to run migrations or not during startup.

method.name: query
method.description: Run a query. Use the resulting[QueryResult] object to read data from the database.
